title: Ep. 600 - The Leftist Misinformation Machine Goes Into Overdrive
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the left wing media is hunting down and combating “misinformation” about the election. The only problem is that much of what they call misinformation is actually completely true. Plus Five Headlines including the CDC’s new Thanksgiving guidelines, which I will be sure to completely ignore. And in our Daily Cancellation I will have to cancel the AP for coming up with a whole new set of words that are now offensive.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
